content.rendered:
Directed by Shirish Kunder

Written by Shirish Kunder

Cast Jacqueline Fernandez (Sona Mukherjee). Manoj Bajpayee (Mrityunjoy Mukherjee). Mohit Raina (Insp. Imran Shahid). Zayn Marie Khan (Anushka Tiwari). Darshan Jariwala (Adv. Brij Rastogi). Deepak Arora (Sid). Chanda Joshi (Rastogi’s Wife). Kartik Soni (Sub-inspector Angad). Anuradha Rajadhyaksha (Anushka’s Mother). Rajesh Mavani (Anushka’s Father). Aparajita Bajaj (Prosecution Lawyer). Nikhil Dave (Judge S. Tiwari). Nalini Anjana (Shanta Bai). Romanch Jadhav (Rastogi’s Son). Joydeep Mukherjee (Doctor at Hospital). Dhwani Acharya (Nurse at Hospital). Yusra Khan (Receptionist at Gynae Clinic). Ayushmaan Jalan (News Reader). Rohit Vennam (Police Constable). Shivraj Walvekar (Police Officer). Nadeem Khan (Townfolk #1). Behram Rana (Townfolk #2). Kaushal Sahajagiti (Townfolk #3). Vipul Deshpande (Prison Official). Poonam Pandey (Afreen).Ariyan Jibon. Tawhid Rike Zaman (Anushka’s Friend)

Languages Hindi, English

Producers Farah Khan. Shirish Kunder. Amit Mehta. Ajay Rai.

Production Three’s Company Production. Netflix
